Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line riders may temporarily experience extended wait times for trains of up to 25 mins.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line riders may temporarily experience extended wait times for trains of up to 25 mins. Please allow extra travel time, or consider nearby bus routes or the Red Line toward the Loop.

 

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
